The Base Template

This base template is the cononical starting point to building a website with A Reasonable Website.

Ready for Content

And excited to help push your hypertext out into the world.

Accessible, Fast, and Kinda Nice-Looking

This base template is 1.7KB. and the single, minified CSS that styles it is 10.7KB.

This site was built with A Reasonable Website, a free template that anyone can use to make an accessible, fast, and kinda nice-looking website.

May we all–forever–be the publishers of our own hypertext.
